overview_of_class: Focus on the tools, methodologies and programs used by companies to develop, justify, deploy and measure their social and mobile marketing programs. Development of complete social marketing programs for actual companies using best practices, including social monitoring, web analytics, social marketing systems, blogs, Twitter, Google Plus, LinkedIn and other tools.
name: Digital, Social and Mobile Marketing
title: DOHA STRATCOM 307-0-70 Digital, Social and Mobile Marketing
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Registration is reserved for NU Qatar Juniors and Seniors Only

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Focus on the tools, methodologies and programs used by companies to develop, justify, deploy and measure their social and mobile marketing programs. Development of complete social marketing programs for actual companies using best practices, including social monitoring, web analytics, social marketing systems, blogs, Twitter, Google Plus, LinkedIn and other tools.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
• Prerequisites: None

  • Open to juniors and above

  • Open for Cross-Registration

subject: STRATCOM
